item.description:
We had to cancel due to the weather, but you can email me if you want the Powerpoint I prepped for the meeting- snapshots of the current real estate market, as well as some as bought pics and plans for an REO I bought last week to rehab and flip.

Warm regards,
annie
item.how_to_find_us: Come on in to the lobby, walk to the rear, go down 2 flights
item.name: Canceled due to weather!
